AD_DoNotTauntTheSpectators.synopsis: Lobby Level - Add a Standing Plaque at approximately IRN_Main_A, Position: -1.75, 44.82, 53.75

AD_DoNotTauntTheSpectators_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_DoNotTauntTheSpectators_0.text: *Do not taunt or tease the aquatic spectator sentries outside the dome. They have a job to do, just like you.*
